summary: The diff modifies backend/main.mo (removing admin permission checks) and adds/modifies numerous frontend files. The core backend requirement (REQ-4) appears to be addressed in main.mo. However, the diff also includes significant frontend changes — new type definitions, new/modified components, new hooks, and new pages — that go well beyond just removing admin checks in the backend.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new frontend type definitions file (frontend/src/types.ts) with full TypeScript interfaces for all data models and a PayrollBackend interface.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly states 'Do not change any frontend UI, layout, components, or pages.' Adding a new types file is a frontend change not requested by any requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified or refactored multiple frontend components: BulkLeaveDayDialog, BulkMonthlyBankSalaryDialog, BulkPaymentEntryTable, DailyBulkEntryTable, EmployeeDialog, EmployeeFolderView, LeaveDayDialog, LeaveEditDialog, MonthlyBankSalariesView, MonthlyBankSalaryDialog, MonthlyBankSalaryEditDialog, MonthlyBankSalaryManager, PaymentEditDialog, WorkDayDialog.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly states 'Do not change any frontend UI, layout, components, or pages.' These are all frontend component changes not requested by any requirement.

The build request explicitly states 'Do not change any frontend UI, layout, components, or pages.' and 'Only remove or bypass the admin role/permission guard checks — no other backend changes.' Modifying frontend query hooks is outside the scope of the requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified frontend page components: CalendarPage, EmployeesPage, LeavePage, MonthlyBankSalariesPage.
hallucinated_features.reason: The build request explicitly states 'Do not change any frontend UI, layout, components, or pages.' These are frontend page changes not requested by any requirement.
